about_the_game: The FOE: Remains Soundtrack. Most of the tracks are associated with one or more specific locations or bosses.
detailed_description: The FOE: Remains Soundtrack. Most of the tracks are associated with one or more specific locations or bosses.
legal_notice:
Fallout: Equestria is a crossover between Fallout game series and My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic show. In a nutshell, it is "post-apocalypse with ponies", but the book itself and a lot of derived fan works forms a whole alive universe.REMAINS has no direct relationship neither with "Fallout" series nor with the show about ponies, though, of course, some references occur here and there.
All trademarks, logos, and brand names used in FOE: Remains are the property of their respective owners. Fallout and My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic are registered trademarks of their respective companies. All company, product, and service names used in this game are for identification purposes only. The use of these names, trademarks, and brands does not imply any endorsement, sponsorship, or affiliation with the Fallout series, My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic, or any other related entities.
name: FOE:Remains Soundtrack
